entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 8:24 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 8:24 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
